channel.title: Won't Xen World get in Source-Engine?
channel.description:
Hello guys,
i would like say about habitabled planets for real life.
Kepler, Giese, Europe, Titan and more habitable worlds are here by us. [img]https://cdn.physorg.com/newman/gfx/news/hires/2012/fivepotentia.jpg[/img]
I ask you because Xen world isn't here and it is unhabitabled from our correct universum, galaxies and solar Systems.
NASA has found some habitabled planets like unknown earths.
[img]https://www.2-0.scienceticker.info/wp-content/uploads/2006/10/simplanetquest-planeten.jpg[/img] [quote] NASA has released data collected from space telescope Kepler and show another number of planets that have an Earth-like in size and allow the habitable zone, where the temperature, the life orbiting its sun.
With the newly announced dates, the number of discovered planets has risen to 1,235. 68 of them have a size planet, as it has about the world. 288 of these planets are called "super-Earths", and have two to ten times the mass of Earth.
662 planets about the size of Neptune, 165 planets, the planets of Jupiter and 19 are larger than the gas giant Jupiter. 54 of the candidates orbiting its star within the habitable zone. [/quote] And see about correct habitable ego-planets: ![](upload://pufB9LkUC2qDYTm9O7ysN24gmAh.jpeg)
Too many different planets / different ego-earths are habitabled.
But xen and mars are not correct habitable because they have not germs for life.
Crying history Since before 4,1 to 2,5 billions years: Mars was given before 3.7 billions years to the second world. Since Mars was caught by the great meteorite. And the earth has luck because it doesn't get crash by big Meteorite and it get a lot of water and Looks like young mars and sky has color pink and water has color green. And before ca 1,5 billions years was the earth changed into Color blue for water and it will be habitable...
That is correct. Sorry for Mars :frowning: because it got big crash :frowning: and breaked his world off and it would like get habitable but hang off Long time :frowning: In ca. 7 billions years ( after red giant ) . [img]https://www.popsci.com/files/imagecache/article_image_large/articles/terraform_main_485.jpg[/img]
And you would know about real xena?
Real Name of xena is "[b]Planet Eris[/b]" and it has not life. [img]https://discordia.loveshade.org/sitebuilder/images/2003_UB313_NASA_illustration_3-950x713.jpg[/img]
Why do we think because xen(o) or Xen(a) are not real world. They just are faked world :frowning: Please believe me right! I won't lie because xen isn't real life by us. :frowning:
We would like to say about current habitable world with current planets or moons :slight_smile: I want get for Source-Engine because Source Engine would like to convert from xen into Giese World.
Big thanks and cheers
SourceSkyBoxer

item.title: Won't Xen World get in Source-Engine?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Xen is a fictional place. It’s not a real life planet as far as we’re aware.

No further good can come from this thread, in my opinion. If there was any to begin with.

Locked.

Read full topic

item.title: Won't Xen World get in Source-Engine?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Ok so, I get it now. He thought Xen was supposed to be a planet that was discovered and named many years after HL1 was released.

So he makes a shitload of research into planets and shit, instead of researching about Xen and HL themselves.

And all of this with an English so broken it would make circa 2009 Eric Fong cringe super hard.

Wonderful.

Read full topic

item.title: Won't Xen World get in Source-Engine?
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Are… Are you aware of this little concept called Fiction? This neat little concept allows human beings to create anything that doesn’t exist in any medium imaginable, including your own mind.

Also, look up “imagination” in an encyclopedia.

Read full topic

Thanks.

Sorry for German Version:
Du hast recht, dass das Wort Xena / Xeno oder Xen auch vom unseren Sonnensystem stammt. Aber du meinst, dass der Entwickler einfach “Xen” für Half-Life als der Geschichte macht.
Danke!

Cheers

item.title: Won't Xen World get in Source-Engine?
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Half-Life#Level

Xen: In der fremden, organischen Welt bekommt er viele bekannte Aliens zu Gesicht und sieht – überall verstreut – tote Wissenschaftler mit HEV-Anzügen, die vor ihm Xen erkundeten. Er findet einen Teleporter und aktiviert ihn.

Xen ist eine fiktive Welt. Es hat keine Entsprechung in der Realität.

Read full topic
